languages.text: "Я хотела бы передать вам дары от ваших верных подданных, высоких дворянских сословий Даргонуса. Разумеется, каждый человек в протекторате счастлив беззаветно служить Вашей Светлости, однако этот знак внимания — скажем так, способ выразить особую признательность за высокую милость, проявленную к их глубокоуважаемым семействам".

traits.locale_text: "Я хотела бы передать вам дары от ваших верных подданных, высоких дворянских сословий Даргонуса. Разумеется, каждый человек в протекторате счастлив беззаветно служить Вашей Светлости, однако этот знак внимания — скажем так, способ выразить особую признательность за высокую милость, проявленную к их глубокоуважаемым семействам".
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Allow me to pass on gifts from your loyal subjects, the high nobility of Dargonus. It goes without saying that every living soul in your protectorate is blessed to serve Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} faithfully and wholeheartedly. However, this humble gesture is meant as a token of deepest appreciation of your magnanimity toward their esteemed families."
languages.original_text: "Я хотела бы передать вам дары от ваших верных подданных, высоких дворянских сословий Даргонуса. Разумеется, каждый человек в протекторате счастлив беззаветно служить Вашей Светлости, однако этот знак внимания — скажем так, способ выразить особую признательность за высокую милость, проявленную к их глубокоуважаемым семействам".

traits.speaker: Clemence

traits.locale_text: "Allow me to pass on gifts from your loyal subjects, the high nobility of Dargonus. It goes without saying that every living soul in your protectorate is blessed to serve Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} faithfully and wholeheartedly. However, this humble gesture is meant as a token of deepest appreciation of your magnanimity toward their esteemed families."
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: « Permettez-moi de vous remettre des cadeaux de la part de vos loyaux sujets de la haute noblesse de Dargonus. Il va sans dire que pour l'ensemble des âmes qui vivent dans votre protectorat, servir Votre Seigneurie est un honneur et une bénédiction. Cependant, cette modeste offrande se veut un gage de profonde reconnaissance pour votre magnanimité à l'égard de leurs illustres familles. »
languages.original_text: "Allow me to pass on gifts from your loyal subjects, the high nobility of Dargonus. It goes without saying that every living soul in your protectorate is blessed to serve Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} faithfully and wholeheartedly. However, this humble gesture is meant as a token of deepest appreciation of your magnanimity toward their esteemed families."

traits.locale_text: « Permettez-moi de vous remettre des cadeaux de la part de vos loyaux sujets de la haute noblesse de Dargonus. Il va sans dire que pour l'ensemble des âmes qui vivent dans votre protectorat, servir Votre Seigneurie est un honneur et une bénédiction. Cependant, cette modeste offrande se veut un gage de profonde reconnaissance pour votre magnanimité à l'égard de leurs illustres familles. »
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: “您的忠诚臣民，达戈努斯的全体贵族向您送来了礼物。在您的王朝，每个人都愿意全心全意为您服务。这是所有人的荣耀，这自不必说。不过，臣民们送上这份谦卑的礼物，是为了对您表达最深切的谢意，感谢您宽宏大量，仁慈对待他们尊贵的家人。”
languages.original_text: "Allow me to pass on gifts from your loyal subjects, the high nobility of Dargonus. It goes without saying that every living soul in your protectorate is blessed to serve Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} faithfully and wholeheartedly. However, this humble gesture is meant as a token of deepest appreciation of your magnanimity toward their esteemed families."

traits.locale_text: “您的忠诚臣民，达戈努斯的全体贵族向您送来了礼物。在您的王朝，每个人都愿意全心全意为您服务。这是所有人的荣耀，这自不必说。不过，臣民们送上这份谦卑的礼物，是为了对您表达最深切的谢意，感谢您宽宏大量，仁慈对待他们尊贵的家人。”
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: 「あなたの忠臣であり、ダルゴナスの高貴なる臣民の皆様からの贈り物をお渡ししましょう。申し上げるまでもありませんが、陛下の保護領に生きるすべての者は、陛下に忠実かつ誠心誠意お仕えすることを光栄に思っております。しかしながら今回のささやかな行為は、彼ら名誉ある一族たちに対する陛下の寛大さへの深い感謝の印としてのものなのです」
languages.original_text: "Allow me to pass on gifts from your loyal subjects, the high nobility of Dargonus. It goes without saying that every living soul in your protectorate is blessed to serve Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} faithfully and wholeheartedly. However, this humble gesture is meant as a token of deepest appreciation of your magnanimity toward their esteemed families."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの忠臣であり、ダルゴナスの高貴なる臣民の皆様からの贈り物をお渡ししましょう。申し上げるまでもありませんが、陛下の保護領に生きるすべての者は、陛下に忠実かつ誠心誠意お仕えすることを光栄に思っております。しかしながら今回のささやかな行為は、彼ら名誉ある一族たちに対する陛下の寛大さへの深い感謝の印としてのものなのです」
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Gestattet mir, Euch Geschenke von Euren treuen Untertanen, dem Hochadel von Dargonus, zu überreichen. Es versteht sich von selbst, dass jede lebende Seele in Eurem Protektorat gesegnet ist, Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} treu und mit ganzem Herzen zu dienen. Diese bescheidene Geste hingegen soll ein Zeichen tiefster Wertschätzung für Eure Großzügigkeit gegenüber ihren geschätzten Familien sein."
languages.original_text: "Allow me to pass on gifts from your loyal subjects, the high nobility of Dargonus. It goes without saying that every living soul in your protectorate is blessed to serve Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} faithfully and wholeheartedly. However, this humble gesture is meant as a token of deepest appreciation of your magnanimity toward their esteemed families."

traits.locale_text: "Gestattet mir, Euch Geschenke von Euren treuen Untertanen, dem Hochadel von Dargonus, zu überreichen. Es versteht sich von selbst, dass jede lebende Seele in Eurem Protektorat gesegnet ist, Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} treu und mit ganzem Herzen zu dienen. Diese bescheidene Geste hingegen soll ein Zeichen tiefster Wertschätzung für Eure Großzügigkeit gegenüber ihren geschätzten Familien sein."
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: «Con su permiso, le traigo obsequios de sus leales súbditos, la aristocracia de Dargonus. Huelga decir que todos los habitantes de su protectorado se sienten honrados de servirle fielmente y de todo corazón, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Aun así, este humilde gesto ha de interpretarse como una muestra de aprecio por su magnanimidad con sus ilustres familias».
languages.original_text: "Allow me to pass on gifts from your loyal subjects, the high nobility of Dargonus. It goes without saying that every living soul in your protectorate is blessed to serve Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} faithfully and wholeheartedly. However, this humble gesture is meant as a token of deepest appreciation of your magnanimity toward their esteemed families."

traits.locale_text: «Con su permiso, le traigo obsequios de sus leales súbditos, la aristocracia de Dargonus. Huelga decir que todos los habitantes de su protectorado se sienten honrados de servirle fielmente y de todo corazón, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Aun así, este humilde gesto ha de interpretarse como una muestra de aprecio por su magnanimidad con sus ilustres familias».
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Sadık tebaanız olan Dargonus yüksek soylularından gelen hediyeleri size iletmeme izin verin. Protektoranızda yaşayan bütün herkesin {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne inanç ve şevk dolu bir şekilde hizmet etme lütfuna nail olduğunu söylemeye gerek yok. Yine de bu mütevazı jest, en saygın ailelere gösterdiğiniz yüce gönüllülüğe duyulan derin minnettarlığın simgesidir."
languages.original_text: "Allow me to pass on gifts from your loyal subjects, the high nobility of Dargonus. It goes without saying that every living soul in your protectorate is blessed to serve Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} faithfully and wholeheartedly. However, this humble gesture is meant as a token of deepest appreciation of your magnanimity toward their esteemed families."

traits.locale_text: "Sadık tebaalarınız olan Dargonus yüksek soylularından gelen hediyeleri size iletmeme izin verin. Protektoranızda yaşayan bütün herkesin {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne inanç ve şevk dolu bir şekilde hizmet etme lütfuna nail olduğunu söylemeye bile gerek yok ancak bu mütevazı jest, en saygın ailelere gösterdiğiniz yüce gönüllülük için derin bir minnettarlık mesajı taşımakta."
traits.speaker: Clemence
